Miami.Miami International University of Art &: Miami International University of Art & Design – formerly known as International Fine Arts College (IFAC), is a nonprofit institution owned and operated by Dream Center Education Holdings (DCEH), LLC which provides programs in design, media and visual arts, fashion, and culinary arts. Established in 1965, the University provides career-focused education in the applied arts and design, and is located in Downtown Miami. The school is accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools.
